images.name: Barrel
images.description: A prop used to add detail to Wish Guardian.

images.name: Bluebells
images.description: A crop in Wish Guardian's NPC area that adds to the scenery.

images.name: Dandelion
images.description: A crop in Wish Guardian's NPC area that adds to the scenery.

images.name: Dirt
images.description: A dirt tile used in Wish Guardian for places where players can plant their crops.

images.name: Grass
images.description: Bright green grass for Wish Guardian that is used on the surface level.

images.name: Ice Ring
images.description: A spell in Wish Guardian that creates a protective ring of ice around the user.

images.name: Minecart
images.description: A prop used to add detail to Wish Guardian.

images.name: Sac Tree
images.description: A Sac Tree, one of the main wood trees of Wish Guardian.

images.name: Shield Animation
images.description: A piece of Wish Guardian's UI that displays how much shielding the player has acquired.

images.name: Electric Double Mushroom
images.description: One of the many crops of Wish Guardian used to craft spells. This one is used to craft electric spells.
